channel.title: That isn't lying on Lemenio
channel.description: Recent content in That isn't lying on Lemenio

item.title: Up
item.description:
It’s hard when asking the question How?

When things get even more tough, we tend to avoid facing them. Start complaining about life. For both of us, it’s the thing we usually do.

item.title: In the end
item.description: I’m still in the process of facing the results of what I did previously. I know. It seems a long time when everyday, keep exposing to it isn’t the good thing att all.
